title: Party boy Scott Disick’s sad confession
text:
Email a friend 
ONE is the loneliest number after all. 
“It’s been a really hard time,” a sullen Scott Disick confessed to ex-girlfriend Kourtney Kardashian, in a preview of the upcoming season of Keeping Up with the Kardashians . “Going from like having all of you guys to having nobody.” 
Disick, 32, who split from Kourtney, 36, earlier this year amid cheating allegations and non-stop partying , fought back tears behind a pair of dark sunglasses as he lamented his choices of late. Emotionally broken ... Scott Disick is all alone. Picture: E! Source: Supplied 
“I f****d up and I made the worst decision I have ever made in my life,” the troubled reality star said. 
But if Disick expected to play the sympathy card with the Kardashian clan, he was sorely mistaken — especially where Kourtney’s concerned. 
“You forget what happens when you’re on a binge,” the mum-of-three noted. Heartbroke ... Kourtney Kardashian wipes away tears. Picture: E! Source: Supplied 
Disick’s struggles with substance abuse have long been documented on the series. 
The New York native, who checked in and out of rehab in March, most recently made a drunken scene while dining in Los Angeles in September. 
“He was with a group of friends, but Scott was roaming the venue and bumping into everyone, totally wasted,” a source told The New York Post. “He was guzzling cocktails left and right.” Relationship woes ... Kourtney Kardashian with her children Mason and Penelope Disick. Picture: AKM-GSI/Splash News Source: Splash News Australia 
Despite Disick’s downward spiral, matriarch Kris Jenner offered a few words of hope that the relationship can be salvaged. 
“I just know that, you know, they’ll figure it out,” Kris, 59, dished to Access Hollywood . “He’s a great dad and he loves the kids and he loves Kourtney.” 
And if Disick’s latest Instagram is any indication, he still holds a flame for his former love. Disick: 'Now that's 1 hot mama'
